title: ERSATZ PRODUCTION
text:
ERSATZ PRODUCTION



Ersatz Production is a production company (association) based in Fribourg, Switzerland.
It was founded in 2024 by four people from different professional backgrounds, united by one common desire, namely going beyond established frameworks.




Going Beyond Established Frameworks



Whether documentary or fiction films - short, medium or feature-length - TV or web series, podcasts, music or live art, our aim is to promote and create audiovisual works with cross-media approach ambitions, while supporting bold and innovative artists.




CURRENT PROJECTS





A short film project by Rani Gillioz



An audio fiction project by Vincent Lettry



Created by Vincent Lettry
Podcast, 105 episodes, 2023 – today
Written, Directed, Produced, Edited, Voice
Listen Now


Hidden link used to verify my account on GitHub

Rani


Director & Creator





Rani got into filmmaking while studying film in Seoul, South Korea. He now works as a freelance translator and spends his free time creating music - or noise - on the piano or computer, playing video games late into the night, and immersing himself in literature and philosophy. He is particularly interested in discovering new experiences and impressions through various forms of art and media, and wishes to convey this through his own work.

View Portfolio















Vincent


President & Creator





Vincent is passionate about education and coaching. He’s interested in many different subjects, from philosophy to music, sports and communication. He’s also a big fan of film and music. As an English and History teacher, he works every day with many people from different backgrounds. He accompanies them and helps them to find their own way. He draws on his social experience and interests to create compelling stories and tells them in a way that makes them accessible to a wide audience.

View Portfolio















Matthias


Creator





Working mainly as a modern art dealer with a background in filmaking, ranging from film analysis to screenwriting as well as acting, Matthias’ intend is to merge his array of skills for the benefit of helping the creation of original works, free of conventions and pre-made ideas.

View Portfolio















Layal


Technology & Organisation





Layal is passionate about languages, whether living, dead or computer-based. After graduating from high school with a focus on languages and philosophy, she went on to study Management and Economics, during which time she developed a passion for statistics and econometrics. After working in the Swiss federal administration as an econometrician, she decided to concentrate on data processing. She then became a consultant in R, working as a data scientist. Thanks to her IT and management skills, she is mainly responsible for maintaining the production company’s IT solutions and finances.

View Portfolio

title: Contact us
text:
Currently, we are unable to accept external projects. However, please do not hesitate to reach out for any additional information or inquiries.
